trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Ipswich
There were no other sightings in Ipswich on or around December 3rd 2011
Summary: It hovered in the sky, moving around and making the the grass and trees look as if a helicopter was landing
divs: Sighting DetailsI noticed a bright light outside my window. My dogs ears had perked, and his fur was on end. The cat was standing horrifically at the window, frozen. (Not literally, just really scared)I looked out the window and saw a huge saucer hovering 15 feet in the air. The grass and trees looked like a helicopter was near them. None of the neighbors knew what I was talking about when I told them later. It hovered, spraying bright light over the neighborhood. I could see my street perfectly because of the light. Then I knew I had to record this. So, I grabbed the nearest pen and magazine (not the best choice for writing on)and recorded the time. That was all I needed to record. I would remember the rest for the rest of my life. (oh, and also, don't call my house, or try to reach me at anyplace but my e-mail) jaoogakayooga
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
